EmailTemplate.subject: The Only Used Aerospace Marketplace That Does This
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Instant pricing and speedy checkout. Two things that only GoDirect Trade offers by using our marketplace for used aerospace parts.
Make things easy for yourself.
Do you send out quote requests because it’s just part of your process? Do you email sellers because price is never posted? Do you use a telephone to place an order?
92% of consumers shop online.
Every time you need an aerospace part, check GoDirect Trade first. It takes a second to search and 60 seconds to checkout.
Our marketplace has been featured in Forbes <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/moorinsights/2020/01/29/honeywell-demonstrates-that-its-an-iiot-not-just-an-ot-company/#3e7c44d768e9]]>, The Wall Street Journal <[[https://www.wsj.com/articles/honeywell-brings-blockchain-to-used-aircraft-parts-market-11559072819]]> and Harvard Business Review <[[https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/pdf/Industries/manufacturing/abstract/HBR-TCS-WP-Nov-2019.pdf]]> and is rapidly moving from “small startup” to “major disruptor." Buy your parts online and you will never want to do it “the old way” ever again. SHOP NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]> Stay safe, stay healthy, and take care,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirect Trade <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]>, Powered by Honeywell
